info.name: assesment-remote-kitchen
info.description:
## API Postman Collection for remote-kitchen-assesment.

The application is developed using Django REST Framework. I have used rest_framework token authentication as api authentication and stripe for online payment.

- version: v1

- github: [https://github.com/tanzid64/task-remote-kitchen.git](https://github.com/tanzid64/task-remote-kitchen.git)

- Author: Tanzid Haque

item.name: auth/

request.description:
## Sign in users

You need to pass username & password with post request. In response it will return a token and user data.

Example shown below.
## Sign up for customer users.
## **Sign up for Owner users.**

item.description:
## Handled Authentication system in this route.

There are four type users.

- Superuser: Django admin or django super user.
    
- Owner: A restaurant owner, identified by role field in user db model.
    
- Customer: All normal users are customer type user or role customer.
    
- Employee: Users with role employee.
    

Authentication Type: Token Authentication.

item.name: restaurant/

request.description:
## Endpoin for add a new employee

- Only owner can make a post req to add a user as his/her restaurant's employee.
    
- Need to pass Authentication token with header as shown in the sample data.
## Get all restaurant List

response.name: All Restaurant

request.description: ## Get a particular restaurant data.

## Update restaurant information.

- Only owner & employee of a restaurant can update its data.

## Delete Restaurant

- Only superuser can delete a restaurant.

item.description:
## Handled Restaurant endpoints here.

- Owner can add an employee from existing users.
    
- Owner & employee can update restaurant, menu & items data.
    
- Others type of user can make get request for restaurant, menu & items data.

item.name: item/
Get all items of a menu

request.description:
## Get all item List of a particular restaurant.

- You need to pass your restaurant & menu slug in the url.

response.name: Get all items of a menu

request.description:
## Get single item details of a restaurant.

- You need to pass your restaurant & menu & item slug in the url.

header.value: GET, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

request.description:
## Create an item for a restaurant.

- Only admin or employee can create an item for his/her restaurant.
    
- You need to pass your restaurant & menu slug in the url.

## Update data of an existing item.

- Only admin or employee can update an item for his/her restaurant.
    
- You need to pass your restaurant & menu slug in the url.

header.value: GET, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

request.description:
## Delete an item of a restaurant.

- Only admin or employee can delete an item for his/her restaurant.
    
- You need to pass your restaurant & menu slug in the url.

item.description:
## Items of a restaurant are handled here.

- Owner or employee of a restaurant can create, update & delete an item.

item.name: menu/

request.description:
## Create a menu.

- Only admin or employee can create, update & delete a menu for his/her restaurant.
    
- You need to pass your restaurant slug in the url.

item.name: Get all menu of a restaurant

request.description:
## Get all menu of a restaurant.

- You need to pass your restaurant slug in the url.

response.name: Get all menu of a restaurant

request.description:
## Get details of menu.

- You need to pass your restaurant & menu slug in the url.

header.value: GET, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

request.description:
## Update a menu data.

- Only owner and employee can update his/her restaurant's menu data.
    
- You need to pass your restaurant & menu slug in the url.

header.value: GET, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

request.description:
## Delete a menu.

- Only owner and employee can update his/her restaurant's menu data.
    
- You need to pass your restaurant & menu slug in the url.

item.description:
## Create menu for a restaurant.

- Only admin or employee can create, update & delete a menu for his/her restaurant.
    
- You need to pass your restaurant slug in the url.
    
- Others type of users can make get request.

item.name: Order/

request.description:
## Place an order.

- Authenticated user can create an order

## Get order List.

- Only owner can get order list.

## Stripe payment session create.

- Payment through stripe onlime payment type orders.

## Stripe Webhook.

- To see stripe payment events.
    
- To learn more follow stripe documentation for python.

item.description:
## Handled order here.

- Authenticated user can create order.
    
- There are two types of payment system: Cash or online.
    
- Online payments handled by stripe.
